Sentencas: Today, the use of alternative energy sources such as solar energy to overcome the obstacles caused by the consumption of fossil fuels is inevitable.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: However, solar energy faces natural issues such as intermittency, instability and uncertainty.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: Meanwhile, integration of clean energy sources can be a key solution.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: On the other hand, fuel cells are conversion devices that have advantages, e.g., high reliability, low emissions, and high efficiency.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: The aim of this study is to present and evaluate the operation of a new energy process based on alkaline fuel cell (AFC) and solar photovoltaic (PV) field.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: AFC produces electrical and thermal power.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: In downstream cycles, additional electricity and cooling are generated by the Stirling engine and the absorption chiller, respectively.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: The solar field provides the power of an electrolyzer to supply fuel and oxidant to the fuel cell.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: Results showed that the cycle can produce up to 3.4 kW of electricity.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: The share of AFC, Stirling engine and solar PV field in electricity generation is 29.3, 21.4 and 49.3 %, respectively.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: It was also found that the electrical and overall efficiencies of the cycle are 64.36 and 77.57 %, respectively.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat

Sentencas: In addition, 77.44 kW of exergy is destroyed.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a polygeneration system based on fuel cell technology and solar photovoltaic and use of waste heat
